name: PENDULUS (INDEV)
description: Pendulus is a 3D adventure game made by Zachary Fetters in the Unity Engine, inspired by both the stories and unique visual styles of the original Silent Hill and Resident Evil games. It is currently in early development and, as such, will be available to everyone for free. Please note that the game is in development and many features in the current versions may not be available in the final release. Also note that this game may contain bugs and glitches, a few of which might be game-breaking. Please report any critical bugs (see: bugs that prevent the operation, starting, exiting, or performance of the game) to zachary.fetters@yahoo.com with the subject "PENDULUS BUG REPORT - [YOUR OS]."
